net.objectzoo.ebc.util

Class ReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.ebc.util.ReflectionUtils

  • public class ReflectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines some Reflection utility methods used by the generic Join EBCs.
    Author:
    tilmann

    • Method Detail

      • findConstructorWithParameters

        public static <T> java.lang.reflect.Constructor<T> findConstructorWithParameters(java.lang.Class<T> objectType,
                                                                                 java.lang.Class<?> parameter1Type,
                                                                                 java.lang.Class<?> parameter2Type)
        Tries to find a Constructor in the object type that takes the two parameter types as parameters.
        Parameters:
        objectType - the object type to find the constructor in
        parameter1Type - the first parameter type
        parameter2Type - the second parameter type
        Returns:
        the found constructor
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no fitting constructor can be found

      • getRawGenericSuperTypeArgument

        public static java.lang.Class<?> getRawGenericSuperTypeArgument(java.lang.Class<?> concreteGenericType,
                                                                int numberOfArgument)
        Retrieve the raw type of the generic super class' type argument. This will only work correctly when the given concrete generic type specifies concrete classes for the type parameters of it's super class. For type variables or wildcard type the raw type of the upper bound will be returned.
        Parameters:
        concreteGenericType - the class of the implementation of a generic type
        numberOfArgument - the number of the generic super class' type argument
        Returns:
        the raw type of the generic super class' type argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no raw type can be determined or the super class is not a parameterized type

      • getGenericSuperType

        public static java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType getGenericSuperType(java.lang.Class<?> concreteGenericType)
        Retrieve the generic super class type of the given concrete generic type.
        Parameters:
        concreteGenericType - the class of the implementation of a generic type
        Returns:
        the generic super class type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the super class is not a parameterized type

      • getRawTypeArgument

        public static java.lang.Class<?> getRawTypeArgument(java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType parameterizedType,
                                                    int numberOfArgument)
        Retrieve the raw type of a given parameterized type's type argument.
        Parameters:
        parameterizedType - the parameterized type
        numberOfArgument - the number of the parameterized type's type argument
        Returns:
        the raw type of the type argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no raw type can be determined

      • getRawType

        public static java.lang.Class<?> getRawType(java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Determine the raw type for a given type
        Parameters:
        type - the type to determine the raw type for
        Returns:
        the raw type of the type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no raw type can be determined
